title: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures recover some losses after S&P 500 tumbles into correction - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures recover some losses after S&P 500 tumbles into correction  Yahoo Finance
description: Stock futures opened higher Tuesday evening after a steep sell-off during the regular trading day, which pushed the S&P 500 and Dow to their lowest settlements so far of 2022.
